# Navigation Heading

**Tag:** `cui-nav-heading`  
**Since:** 1.0.0  
**Status:** Preview  
**Category:** components  
**Source:** https://coherence-ftekb0dcfpcjb3gv.b02.azurefd.net/resources/nav-heading/

> Web Components

## Import

```js
import '@charm-ux/cui/dist/components/nav-heading/index.js'
```

## Guidance

### Integration

- You will need to install the full Coherence for Fluent 2 code package to use this component. Follow the installation instructions in the developer starter kit.
- And then you'll need to include the following imports in your file:
- import '@charm-ux/cui/dist/components/nav-heading/index.js'

### Provide feedback

- Reach out to us if you spot a bug or have a feature request. Your feedback is critical to the success of Coherence and everyone who uses it.
- Contact us on Teams

## API Reference

### Slots

| Slot | Description |
|------|-------------|
| (default) | Utilized for specifying the nav heading. |

### Attributes

| Attribute | Type | Description | Default |
|-----------|------|-------------|---------|
| dir | `'ltr' | 'rtl' | 'auto'` | The dir global attribute is an enumerated attribute that indicates the directionality of the element's text. |  |

### Events

| Event | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| ready | Emitted when the component is ready. |

### CSS Custom Properties

| Property | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| `--nav-heading-color` | The color of the nav heading. |
| `--nav-heading-font-size` | The font size of the nav heading. |
| `--nav-heading-font-weight` | The font weight of the nav heading. |
| `--nav-heading-line-height` | The line height of the nav heading. |

### CSS Parts

| Part | Description |
|------|-------------|
| nav-heading-base | The base of the nav heading. |
